quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the production of fire-fighting equipment. The Company operates its businesses through six segments. The Fire-fighting Equipment segment manufactures and sells pressure vessels (including fire-fighting equipment products and pressure vessels products). The Aquarium Products segment engages in manufacture and sale of aquarium products. The Marine Fire-fighting Equipment segment engages in sales of marine fire-fighting equipment and provision of related installation services. The Inspection Services segment engages in provision of fire technology inspection services and marine fire-fighting equipment inspection services. The Property Investment segment engages in investment and lease of office building and industrial properties for rental income purpose. The Trading segment engages in trading of other products. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic and overseas markets.
